name: Crime City Nightmare
description: Eldritch horrors lurk within the crime and grime of Valoran City. Black markets have given rise to Elixirs: a valuable substance of dubious origin whose production spells money and influence should any gang corner the market. Spurred on by agents of corruption, capos and cronies alike look to forces beyond the veil for a taste of true power.

skinlines.name: Crime City
skinlines.description: Valoran City, a sprawling machine fueled by crime and oiled by sordid money. No one admits this truth, but everyone knows it.

skinlines.name: Crime City Nightmare
skinlines.description: If corruption and illegality existed on a map, Valoran City would be its center. A breeding ground for all things depraved, there are no depths too deep from which evil can be found, and the horrors that lurk there are eager to spread their influence.

skinlines.name: Debonair
skinlines.description: Power, wealth, and glamour collide in the penthouses and exclusive clubs of Nox Vegas, where truly beautiful people hold the world in their palms. Yet as night falls on the city of lights, the knives come outâ€”influence is the name of the game, and nobody likes to lose.
